channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Configure App-V Server to use HTTPS
item.description:
1. Intro In the last 8 months we were contacted by customers in several support cases regarding the question how to implement a secure connection with https between 2 servers, the publishing server and the management server in an App-V environment. The customers had Windows Server 2019 in place and were using the latest version of App-V Server 5.1.136.1*. That’s the reason, why we shared our experiences with the community in November 2024 during the M.A.D. days and now want to share the procedure how to setup such a connection in this blog.
During the M.A.D. Days in Hamburg 2024, we demoed...
